readability_reflection: I found string interpolation more useful and readable, especially with the longer expressions.
comprehension_debugging: Yes, interpolation made it easier for me to identify values in context. I found concatenations trickier when mixing numbers and strings.
preference_rationale: I prefer string interpolation because it has fewer syntax errors than concatenation.
learning_curve: At first, string concatenation felt easier because I had used it before. But after practicing with interpolation in this survey, I found it much simpler and straightforward.
